name: Territory Game Challenge
description:
A short game made in a few days because someone challenged me in my youtube comments to make a territory game haha

Click on a territory or empty space to invade it. You can only invade 1 territory at once. Taking 1 pixel of empty space gives you 1 power. Taking 1 pixel from an enemy takes away 1 power from you and the enemy. When someone reaches 0 power, they are gone and their territory becomes empty space ( get power from it ). Power goes up over time too.
